# Debugger Agent
This agent is designed to assist with debugging and understanding the TD-MPC2 codebase. It can help identify issues, explain code functionality, and provide insights into the architecture and design choices of the project. Use this agent when you need to troubleshoot problems, clarify complex sections of the code, or gain a deeper understanding of how different components interact within the TD-MPC2 framework.
